Terms of Use - SongScribe Tuner

Last Updated: February 15, 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By downloading, installing, or using SongScribe Tuner ("the App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the App.

2. Description of Service

SongScribe Tuner is a mobile application that provides real-time instrument tuning using your device's microphone. The App offers:

  • Chromatic Tuning: Detects any musical note across a wide frequency range
  • Instrument Presets: Optimized tuning modes for Guitar, Ukulele, Bass, and Violin
  • Customizable Reference Pitch: Adjustable reference frequency (430-450Hz, default: 440Hz)
  • Visual Feedback: Real-time pitch display with needle indicator and cent deviation
  • Note Display Options: Choose between sharps or flats notation

3. Free vs. Paid Features

3.1 Free Version (Ad-Supported)

The free version includes:

  • All tuning features (chromatic and instrument presets)
  • Customizable reference pitch
  • Real-time pitch detection
  • Banner advertisements on non-tuning screens

Advertising Policy:

  • Ads are displayed on settings and informational screens
  • NO ads are shown during active tuning to avoid distraction
  • Ads are provided by Google AdMob
  • You can remove ads permanently with a one-time purchase

3.2 "Remove Ads" Purchase

A one-time, non-consumable purchase of $1.99 (USD) that includes:

  • Permanent removal of all advertisements
  • Access to all tuning features
  • No subscription required
  • Purchase is tied to your Apple ID and can be restored on other devices

4. Microphone Permission

The App requires microphone access to function. By granting microphone permission:

  • You allow the App to capture audio in real-time for pitch detection
  • You understand that audio is NOT recorded, stored, or transmitted
  • Audio processing occurs entirely on your device
  • You can revoke microphone permission at any time in device settings

If you deny microphone access, the App cannot function as a tuner.

5. Data and Privacy

Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy for details on:

  • What data we collect (minimal)
  • How we use your data
  • Third-party services (AdMob, Apple, Analytics)
  • Your rights and choices

Key Privacy Points:

  • ✅ Microphone audio is never recorded or stored
  • ✅ Settings are stored locally on your device
  • ✅ We do NOT access your personal files or contacts
  • ✅ You can delete all data by uninstalling the app

6. Purchases and Payments

6.1 Payment Processing

All purchases are processed through Apple's App Store. By making a purchase, you agree to Apple's terms and conditions.

6.2 Non-Refundable

In-app purchases are non-refundable except as required by law or Apple's refund policy. To request a refund, contact Apple Support.

6.3 Restore Purchases

If you reinstall the App or use it on a new device, you can restore your "Remove Ads" purchase at no additional cost:

  1. Open the App
  2. Tap Settings → Restore Purchases
  3. Sign in with the same Apple ID used for the original purchase

6.4 Price Changes

We reserve the right to change the price of the "Remove Ads" purchase at any time. Price changes do not affect existing purchases.

7. Permitted Use

You agree to use SongScribe Tuner only for lawful purposes. You may NOT:

  • Use the App to infringe on intellectual property rights

8.2 User Data

You retain ownership of any settings or preferences you configure within the App. We do not claim ownership of your data.

9. Disclaimer of Warranties

THE APP IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT:

  • The App will be uninterrupted or error-free
  • Pitch detection will be 100% accurate in all environments
  • The App will be compatible with all devices or iOS versions
  • The App will meet your specific requirements

Accuracy Notice: Pitch detection accuracy depends on:

  • Quality of your device's microphone
  • Background noise levels
  • Instrument volume and clarity
  • Proper tuning technique

We strive for accuracy but cannot guarantee perfect results in all conditions.
